product_name: Boreal Joker Plus Strap Rock Shoes - Women's
long_description: Whether you're grabbing holds at the gym or placing gear on a classic multipitch route, you'll find the women's Boreal Joker Plus Strap rock shoes to be the ideal blend of comfort and performance. High-quality split leather uppers feature reinforced rip-and-stick closures that allow quick on and off and simple adjustment. 4 - 4.6mm-thick Boreal FS-QUATTRO rubber is extremely sticky and highly abrasion resistant; rubber provides consistent performance across a range of temperatures. Polyurethane mesh linings and padded, mesh tongues move moisture away from your feet to ensure comfort while climbing. Lightly cambered lasts and asymmetric sole shapes enable excellent edging while maintaining great sensitivity. EVA pads placed within the heels absorb shock. Go with your street shoe size if you plan to wear the Boreal Joker Plus Strap rock shoes all day, or size it a bit smaller for shorter sessions of bouldering or sport climbing.
short_description: Whether you're grabbing holds at the gym or placing gear on a classic multipitch route, you'll find the women's Boreal Joker Plus Strap rock shoes to be the ideal blend of comfort and performance.
